testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 2.13 - Add a Recipe, error path - add the same recipe twice

testcase.name: And the user has selected add a recipe

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 2.13 - Add a Recipe, error path - add the same recipe twice

testcase.name: And the current mode of the coffee maker is "WAITING"
